title: Can't connect to games after champion select
body:
I've been trying to play games however after champion select is complete I get the option to 'reconnect' and once I press this the game begins to load for a second and then I get kicked out again only to see the 'reconnect' button again. 
This has been happening for some time now and I have lost 3 flex promotional games because of it. 

Please provide a fix, 
cheers

EDIT: I have reset internet; doesn't work and also can't spectate

replies.body: Same issue here and lost almost a full rank worth of LP and 10 leaver buster games.
getting same issue, never had before this patch

Hey there,

That definitely sounds odd, is league [allowed through your firewall](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues#wq3)?
